overview: Gorgeous Young Women and their handsome paramour in exciting erotic role playing to add ever more spark to their sex lives. "Love stripper" brings you a tale of a nice and naughty strip-o-gram. It seems someone has sent Logan Pierce a stripper, Kimmy Granger. She will sing or strip- Guess which he picks? In "Tantric Massage" an unsuspecting husband, Ramon Normar is surprised by a visit from a Swedish masseuse, Blair Williams. Watch as these hot and romantic couples spice up their love affairs- It'll spice up your love life too!
title: Fantasy Roleplay 2
